item.title: JNJ
item.description: score:-6 Chances: Johnson & Johnson Forecasts Double-Digit Earnings Growth After Kenvue Spin-Off Johnson & Johnson Announces Updated Financials and 2023 Guidance Following Completion of the Kenvue Separation Why Johnson & Johnson (JNJ) is a Great Dividend Stock Right Now J&J’s Kenvue Exchange Offer Was a Big Win for the Little Guy Ken Fisher’s Top 15 Healthcare Stock Picks Risks: Johnson & Johnson Just Cut an Entire Division.

item.title: KDP
item.description: score:-34 Chances: Strong performance and earnings beats in recent quarters. Positive outlook for the beverage industry and growth potential. Strategic partnerships and investments for expansion. Dividend declaration and high-yielding dividend stock. Institutional ownership and stability in ownership structure. Risks: Potential impact of cost woes and inflation on profitability.
